documents.document:
Antriksh Heights Luxury Apts. Sector 84 Gurgaon

Antriksh Group brings with its residential project Antriksh Heights located at Sector 84 near Dwarka Expressways in Gurgaon. With more than 80% open spaces, the project ensures a perfect lifestyle with all the features supporting opulence and comfort. This 20 storied complex is a perfect blend of modernity and aesthetic appeal. Nearby localities of Heights are Vatika City, Sikandarpur, and Sector 85 etc. Connecting to the other parts of the NCR and to the other states as well is very easy from here. NH 8 or locally called Ajmer road connects the project site to the other parts of the city. There is also a State Highway 15 and 13 making it a lot easier to connect to the main parts of the city and state. Antriksh Heights is being developed with a number of useful recreational amenities such as 2 swimming pools, commercial with food court, central open with playground, tennis court & badminton court, jogging track, Sky Bridge, fountain, open sit-outs, uninterrupted view to green, 24x7 power and water supply etc.

Location:
Antriksh Heights is strategically located in Sector 84 Near Dwarka Expressway in Gurgaon surrounded by Elite posh colonies world class malls & Multiplexes All Around Adjacent To The Proposed 150 meter wide road with Metro Track from Dwarka infront of ISBT & Metro station distance in minutes by road 15 minutes from IGI Airport, 35 minutes from Cannaught Place, 5 Minutes from Reliance Sez.

Amenities:
Kids Play Area, Club House, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Multipurpose Hall, Telecom and Landscape Garden.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1825 sq ft to 2095 sq ft
Prices: 4500/sq ft

About Antriksh Group:
An ISO 9001:2000 Certified, Profit making, highly rising, Real Estate company with a track record of quality construction. Leading builder and promoter of housing societies, commercial buildings, Shopping Malls etc. in Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon and all over India. Well equipped, plant and machinery and sound relations with India's leading Ready Mix Concrete (RMC) supplying companies like-Birla Ready Mix and J.K.Ready Mix. Company has lot of experience to work with reputed and well established Architects - Consulting Engineering Services India Ltd.

Assotech Blith - Residential Tower in Sector 99 Gurgaon

Assotech with the aim of building “Next Generation Spaces” along with Sun Apollo, a real estate private equity firm which invests in acquisitions and development of assets across property is coming up with a Group Housing along Dwarka Express-way at Sector-99, Gurgaon- “Assotech Blith”
The housing spreads over a land area of 12.062 acres, will comprise of High Rise Towers of 2 BHK, 3BHK, 3 BHK + Servant room + Study & 4 BHK + Servant room + Study apartments as per the market requirements catering to buyers of all segments of the society. Some inventory of villas has also been introduced to take the advantage of huge demand for this.
The site is strategically located at Sector 99, in the upcoming New Gurgaon Area which is in close proximity to the newly built Terminal-3 of Indira Gandhi International Airport i.e. 15 minutes drive by way of 150 m Northern Peripheral Expressway road proposed to be built in the NCR region, connecting Dwarka to NH 8 near Manesar.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: Residential Apartments
2/3 & 4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1350 sq ft to 2675 sq ft
Prices: 5100/sq ft

Amenities:
Low rise development on the Southern side and High rise development on the Northern side for maximum utilization of Natural Resources
VAASTU compliant.
Introduction of water bodies along the wind path to control temperature.
Architectural devices such as wind chimneys, atria, courtyards, windows, and operable blinds to induce natural air flow
Gated community with Two Tier security system.
Fully loaded apartments with split A/c, wardrobes and geysers.
Spacious Modular Kitchen with chimney & hobs.
Powder Room.
Maximize Green Area with large central park, fountains and water bodies.
Large Balconies.
Double height Entrance Lounge.
Concierge Desk with mailbox facilities.
Kid’s Bicycle Stand.
Pavilion and Paragola sitouts for senior citizens.
Amphitheatre & Play Areas.
Modern Club House.
Swimming Pool (separate for both male and female).
Gym, Massage Room/Jacuzzi.
Meditation Court/Yoga Hall.
High Speed Elevators.
Basement for Parking and Services.

About Assotech Group:
The seeds of “Assotech Limited” were planted in the year 1987 by Mr. Sanjeev Srivastva, a distinguished Civil Engineer with a mammoth experience of more than two decades in doing pioneering works, designing and executing various civil construction projects. The Group is a conglomerate of companies engaged in Real-Estate development, offering a whole gamut of activities related development and construction.
The group has close to Rs. 33 billion worth of projects under various stages of development and execution and over 1000 staff under its umbrella. Till date, Assotech Ltd has already handed over 7 million square feet built up area to its esteemed customers. Presently the group is constructing approximately 8 million square feet of real estate area for its new customers.

3c Greenopolis Newly Launch Project in Gurgaon

3C Greenopolis is fresh and upcoming residential project launch by 3c Company & it’s located at sector 89 Gurgaon. 3C Greenopolis Gurgaon project is spread over a huge space in order to provide you the sufficient open space for fresh air and sunlight in each part of the apartments and at the same time these apartments are situated in very convenient place from where you can get close proximity to the major part of the city. To facilitate your connectivity to different parts of the city the project has been allocated a location such that it lies close to metro station and ISBT is also near to the project. Not only this, the air port lies at a drive away distance of just 25 mins. Dwarka Expressway enjoys easy accessibility to this project. The location, being one of the hot places of the town features everything that one needs for happy and relaxing lifestyle. Not only the place, but the services, the environment and the atmosphere, all take you to the new level of residing, making sure that you live a enjoyable lifestyle.

3c Company marks a large green area in its design of the project which makes the living a really refreshing experience. The 3C company has been performing really well in Noida where its projects like 3C Zing and Lotus Panache etc have attracted several buyers and investors.

Types & Sizes:
Types: 2/3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1297 sq ft to 1918 sq ft
Prices: 5250/sq ft

USP of the Project
Entrance by 75 mtr spacious road
Surrounding to 135mtr spacious Multiutility Lobby road.
Adjacent to Sector 88-Commercial zone.
Largest sector in New Gurgaon domain.
1Km from Dwarka Expressway, 1.5 Km by Pataudi Road.
No Small town in the sphere.
Mutual Facilities: High Speed Lifts, Convenient and daily necessity shop.
Other Provision like play school, primary school, Children Park and water bodies.

Launching Soon!

New Upcoming Project at Gurgaon Launches by Reputed Builder

This project is a part of group housing development on Sector 102 new Dwarka expressway with total area spanning around 41 acres. Sector 102 Gurgaon Projects offers a charming blend of Contemporary Indian living with the best of modern amenities to ensure warm and cozy living. This project is strategically located in Sector 102 on upcoming Dwarka expressway that will lead to International Airport on one side and National Highway NH 8 on the other.

Location:
Upcoming Project is located at Sector 102 Dwarka Expressway, Gurgaon just located on 150 mtrs wide from Dwarka Expressway, 8 km from Delhi Border, 9 km from Dwarka Sector 21, Metro Station.

Amenities:
3 Tier Securities, Party Lawn, Swimming Pool, Commercial with Food Court, Central Open with Playground, Tennis Court, Badminton Court, Jogging Track, Sky Bridge, Fountain and Uninterrupted View to Green.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 2/3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1500 sq ft to 2350 sq ft
Prices: 5200/sq ft

About Builder:
The developer is an infrastructure development company that specializes in providing comprehensive engineering, project and construction management services for the power generation and transmission sector. The company has a core competency in the establishment of power projects,- a sector that holds much promise for growth as the demand for affordable, dependable and reliable supply of electricity is essential for the increasing population and the rapidly growing economy of India. This company has the core competencies required to provide Project Management Consulting (PMC) services for the project or undertake execution of power projects on Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) contract basis. The company has leading edge competencies for EPC contracts covering civil, electrical, and mechanical and instrumentation engineering, project and construction management, systems, planning and operational services.

Terra Upcoming Project Launches by BPTP Group

BPTP Terra Sector 37D is one of the most desirable residential localities in Gurgaon, being located in close vicinity to the Dwarka Expressway. BPTP Terra Gurgaon will give you a great atmosphere to live in and let you make your life is a never ending bash. The project is fully loaded with Italian marble, modular kitchen, AC and woodwork. The prime features of BPTP New Launch are high-tech security, dedicated parking, modular kitchen with piped gas supply, wooden flooring, ultra modern toilets, in-home maintenance services etc. For BPTP New Launch and BPTP New Projects, Kindly Fill ups your Information. Our Associates will contact you soon.

Location:
BPTP Terra is located at Sector 37D Gurgaon.

Location Advantages:

On the Dwarka Expressway far away from the fluff of the city, closer vicinity to the proposed metro station, railway station, IGI airport, Rajiv Chowk, IFFCO Chowk, Radisson hotel.
BPTP Terra Gurgaon is going to be the first Eco-community in Sector 37D, aimed at a zero carbon footprint. Enhanced day lighting, windmills, solid conservation, rain water harvesting, solar power generation as well as effective waste management system, the Eco Community at BPTP Terra promises to be the ideal project with a view of the future. An essence of luxury, an indication of all that you seek for and deserve in life, right from large room sizes, finer architecture to the best of amenities is designed to make you feel in the lap of luxury. BPTP Terra offers you a peaceful life in pleasant surroundings

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 3 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1650 sq ft to 2000 sq ft
Prices: 5500/sq ft

About BPTP:
In the eight years since its inception, BPTP has established itself as a leading company in the NCRs real estate sector. Committed to achieving excellence in architecture, design, aesthetics and infrastructure, the company has redefined the concept of viable realty with its mega township Parklands in Faridabad and is now setting new benchmarks in luxury housing with various projects across the NCR. With its impressive portfolio of contemporary commercial, residential, IT park and retail developments, the company is spearheading the growth and expansion of the real estate sector.

Raheja Oma Residential Apartments, Haryana

Raheja Oma comes with options of high rise Akasha Residences or low raises Sansara Residences in sizes of 1,2,3,4 BHK condominiums and penthouses it’s spread over 8.53 Acres situated on the conjunction of NH-8 and NH-71B (Rewari-Sohna-Palwal Highway), in Sector 2A of Dharuhera, Haryana.

The project, Raheja Oma, will house 640 apartments and will be one of the tallest buildings in the area with 40 storeys, the company claimed.

Raheja developers targeting foreign nationals working in different MNCs, especially those in the auto firms, located in the industrial areas nearby. We are offering a wide range of flats from 1-BHK to 6-BHK," Raheja said, adding the total number of flats will be 640, including service apartments. In the twilight years of their lives, Raheja Oma is your way of reciprocating all the love and affection they bestowed on you, by gifting them an oasis of peace and serenity, in an exclusive gated environment. A self sustainable and secure community surrounded by all the necessary conveniences like medical center, health programs, shopping etc.

Types: Residential Apartments – 2/3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 2126 sq ft to 3047 sq ft.
Prices: 2975 sq. ft.

Amenities: Club House, Jogging Track, Landscaped Garden, Gymnasium, Sport Facility, Multipurpose Hall and Kids play area.

About Raheja Group:
Raheja Developers Limited was incorporated in the year 1990 by Mr. Navin M. Raheja, the first generation entrepreneur. Today, the company enjoys a strong presence in NCR and has made its position as one of the largest companies in the Real Estate Industry. The company is one of the fastest growing entities in the realty sector with a difference that offers luxury for reasonable costs, excellent customer care levels with highest customer satisfaction index and the highest imaginable standards for the welfare of its staff, society as well as for the environment.

CHD Upcoming Project Golf Avenue Gurgaon

CHD developers are launching a new project Golf Avenue in sector 106, Gurgaon. CHD Golf Avenue is a premium multi storey project strategically located on Dwarka Expressway. CHD Golf Avenue is spread over a sprawling area of 12.5 acres in sec 106, Gurgaon with 10 towers of luxurious 2BHK, 3BHK and 4BHK. All towers will be facing Central Greens covering over 60% area of the Project. The Project is based on self sustainable model, echo-friendly environment with higher green ratio and engineered in a way to provide max flow of air and abundant daylight. CHD developers are continuing their legacy forward after Avenue-71 which is really providing a posh lifestyle with design architecture by PageSutherlandPage, USA and construction by Chawla Techno Construction etc.

Location:
CHD Golf Avenue is located at Sector 106, Gurgaon with Just 5 mins drive from IGI Airport & Dwarka, and two way connectivity from Dawarka & NH-8 & located near to Diplomatic area & Metro station of Dwarka.

Amenities:
Pollution free area, ample landscaping, gardens, water bodies, jogging tracks & yoga Meditation centre, Sports facilities like badminton courts, billiard tables, basket Ball, Well equipped club with facilities like Gymnasium, Swimming Pool, card rooms, Nursery school, convenient Shops and Departmental Stores within the complex.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1511 sq ft to 3016 sq. ft.
Prices: 4850/p sq ft

About CHD Group:
CHD Developers business philosophy is deeply rooted in the company unshakeable belief in charting new horizons with a singularity of purpose and breadth of vision. Continuous innovation lies at the heart of the company core values, and this enables CHD Developers to constantly invent and implement across the board in conceptualization, implementation and support. It is this belief system that has driven CHD Developers, over the years, to diversify and grow in new domains and segments of the real estate business such as integrated townships, commercial complexes and retirement villages in prime locations across the country.

Geoworks 1000 Trees Group Housing Project Gurgaon

Geoworks group launches its group housing project 1000 TREES on Sector 105, Dwarka Expressway Gurgaon spread over a sprawling area of 13.5 acres. A perfect blend of majestic ambience humming with eco friendly environment, the most enviable and prestigious residential project in the Capital neighborhood with 60% greenery to maintain harmony and amidst nature luxury, experiencing the best of life. Geoworks 1000 trees gurgaon handpicked location of the site is the main USP of the project. Situated in one of the fastest growing areas in the NCR, and near 150 meter wide expressway, first of its kind in India.

Location:
Geoworks 1000 trees are located at Sector 105, Gurgaon

Location Advantages:
•Connected to Dwarka Phase-2 and on the Dwarka Express Highway.
•10 minutes from nearest metro Located in Sector 105 of Gurgaon near the 150m
•Being just 3km from the Delhi border andapprox. 5 km
•10 minutes Drive to IGI Airport.
•Located close to the Delhi International Airport and the proposed
•Dwarka-Manesar Expressway, ATS Kocoon will connect the prime locations of Delhi with those of Gurgaon.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1700 sq ft to 2529 sq ft
Prices: 4250/sq ft

Project Size – 15 Acre.
Built –Up- Area – 13.5 Lac Sq Fts.
No. of Units Available – 852

About Geoworks Group:
Geoworks is a well diversified business conglomerate with its presence in various sectors like Real Estate, Infrastructure, Education and Manufacturing under the leadership of our Chairman and experienced Board members. Geoworks is scaling new heights and touching the horizon of excellence. Geoworks is well managed by professionals of long standing in Real Estate development. The Company maintains the highest level of professionalism & has set new benchmarks of quality & service excellence. We aspire to refine our skills and increase our investments, in this space.The Company has nurtured innovative management and dynamic leadership in expanding, updating & diversifying its operations in real estate development with a keen eye on relevant skills, Marketing, technology & resources. As one or the fastest growing Real Estate companies of India, Geoworks envisions becoming the nation's foremost development player.

Bestech New Upcoming Project Gurgaon

Bestech New Project is a group housing apartments located in Sector 92 – Gurgaon. Having the most luxurious apartments, it is a unique evolution in the habitat design. It's the dawn of a new phenomenon, an enthralling experience & an ultimate lifestyle. A residential development that places beauty, design integrity and sustainability at its core. The Bestech New launch Project is technologically complex and exhibit quality infrastructure. The Design and architecture of the project is International Standard. Bestech New Project in Gurgaon has all world class amenities and facilities such as Power Back-up, Corner Flat.

Location:
Bestech New Project is located at Sector 92, Gurgaon

Location Advantages:
10 minutes from South Delhi
45 minutes from Connaught place
5 minutes from International Airport
Metro connectivity at large.
Hub of IT & Multinational companies
well developed Shopping Malls
Easy accessibility from NH8, MG Road, Mehrauli Gurgaon Road.
Well connected to upcoming Dwarka Expressway & Periphery Road.
World class School such as G D Goenka, DPS, Pathways.

Amenities:
Power Back-up, Corner Flat / House / Plot, Intercom Facility, Security / Fire Alarm, Lift(s), Swimming Pool, Water Storage, Reserved Parking, Maintenance Staff, Park, Visitor Parking.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 3/4 BHK Apartments
Sizes: 1700sq ft. to 2200 sq ft
Prices: 5000/sq ft

About Bestech Group:
Bestech Group is emerging as one of the most respected and renowned business houses in India over the last 2 decades. The group has developed impeccable goodwill and enjoys a position of leadership in India in its operating sector. Bestech Group has consolidated its business into three major areas of the construction and development industries sector i.e. Real Estate, Hospitality and Construction which are prime areas of business, employment generation and quality creations.

Experion New Upcoming Project Dwarka Expressway

Experion Developers Pvt Ltd presents a new residential project Experion New Project at Dwarka Expressway, Gurgaon. The project will have access via 60m and 75m Northern Periphery Road & spread over 15 acres (More Than 8 ACRES CENTRAL GREEN) of land and offers the choice of 2, 3 and 4 BHK apartments. The township offers a state-of-the-art building with world-class specifications, and Modern amenities include a very large one of its kind 24 x 7 manned security, Grand Clubhouse, Huge Green Area inside Campus, State of art electronic surveillance, Monitored access & exit systems. Each and every apartment ensures that you need not to conciliation with the eminence of existence. The open rooms, ventilation, sun light, great features and picturesque views are a complementary features that the Experion New Project Gurgaon offer.

Location:
Experion New Project is located at Sec - 108 will have access via 60m and 75m Northern Periphery Road Dwarka Expressway, Gurgaon.

Amenities:
Club house, Sport facility, Tennis court, Kids play area, Power backup, Jogging track and landscaped garden

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 2/3/4 BHK Apts
Sizes: 1190 sq ft to 2125 sq ft
Prices: 1, 02, 00,000/-
Price per sq ft: 4800/sq ft

About Experion Developers Pvt Ltd
Founded in March 2007, Experion Developers Pvt Ltd is a 100% FDI funded real estate developer backed by Singapore-based AT Capital Pvt Ltd. For the last 5 years, the company has been actively engaged in procuring strategic land parcels pan India to develop projects that offer meaningful and aesthetically unparalleled living spaces, differentiating themselves through niche products in key markets. At EDPL we believe in Choreographing memorable and positive experiences for our investors, customers and stakeholders that they would love to come back to and identify us a preferred partner for real estate investments. Owing to thorough study and analysis of the existing real estate environment and the potential growth corridors, the group has successfully consolidated land parcels upwards of 700 acres in various parts of Delhi NCR, Haryana, Punjab, Rajasthan, Andhra Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh, Goa and Maharashtra all through an all equity investment model. Starting first quarter of 2012, EDPL will commence developing premium group-housing projects, commercial spaces, organized retail destinations, townships, hotels and resorts on these land parcels:

Emaar Imperial Gardens Pre Launch Project Sector 102, Gurgao

Emaar Imperial Gardens is a fresh modern design by the famous yet prominent Emaar MGF at a greatest classy locality of Gurgaon. Offering residents the ideal place of existence, this housing project is featured by means of 3 Bedroom + Study + S. Room apartments with garden facing units with AC & Modular Kitchen that are ranging from a larger amount of area. As these homes are hallowed with ultra deluxe facilities comprehensive of the lush green vicinity and environment, people are more attracted towards investing in this for lifetime. With an very close convenience to major supreme places in the town at Dwarka expressway, Emaar Imperial Gardens Gurgaon is located much far away from the hazy pollution and yet nearer to hazy pollution of the city. People looking for a long term investment can find this is at the best one for a secure future.

Location:
Emaar Imperial Gardens is located at Sector 102 , Gurgaon - Next to Dwarka Expressway.

Amenities:
Kids play area; Power backup, Car parking, Sport Facility, Jogging Track and Landscaped Garden, swimming pool, multipurpose hall, cafeteria.

Prices & Sizes:
Types: 3 BHK Apartments
Size: 2000 sq ft
Price: 1, 30, 00,000/-
Price per sq. ft. - 6500/sq ft

About Emaar MGF:
Emaar MGF Land Private Limited is a joint venture between Emaar Properties PJSC Dubai - the world's leading real estate company and MGF Development Limited, India's leading real estate developer. A collaboration that has brought in the largest FDI in India's real estate space and opened up the horizons of tomorrow. Emaar MGF is engaged in Pan-India projects in residential, commercial, infrastructure and hospitality sectors in integrated master plans and Special Economic Zones.

DLF Garden City Gurgaon! Luxurious Township - Sector 81 to 9

DLF Garden City A place you would be proud to call your home. Being as the hottest property in the millennium city yet, DLF Garden City new residential project at Sector-81 to 95, Gurgaon, adjoining to vast acres of planned open spaces as assigned in Gurgaon Master Plan 2021, is the highly promising coming as a great value prospect to gain the high-returns from investments on property more than other residential properties in Gurgaon. DLF Planned Near 1000 acres of open space. DLF Garden City offering 3 & 4 BHK Apartments at very reasonable prices. DLF have planned 3500 apartments nearing completion. And the Development work in progress at plotted colony for over 3000 residents. It is an assurance for investors and homebuyers register it, however, if ensured of DLF Group to have been presenting the dreams alive for last 6 decades such as this new residential project at Sector-91 & 92 reliable to keep your standard high. Great places have always been discovered by the will of man. And in our quest to discover the next big place, we located a new land. A land of great potential and a place you would be proud to call your home.Location:DLF Garden City is located at very exotic location Sector 81 to 95, Gurgaon.LOCATION ADVANTAGE:•It’s centrally located in the heart of New gurgaon•Close to large commercial Business District at Sectors 74A & 75A.•Unrivalled access from all major arterial roads for seamless connectivity.PROJECT UPDATE:•3500 Apartments nearing Completion.•Development Work in Progress at plotted Colony.•For over 3000 Residents.ACCESSIBILITY:•From South Delhi via 90m wide Southern Periphery Road.•From Central Delhi via 150m wide NH8 merging into 90m wide central Periphery road.•Close to Upcoming KMP Expressway.•From Dwarka via 150m wide Northern Periphery Road.Amenities:Kids play area, children playground, gymnasium, Cafeteria, Swimming Pool, Indoor games, Outdoor games, multipurpose hallPrices & Sizes:Types: 3/4 BHK ApartmentsSizes: Coming Soon!Prices: Coming Soon!About DLF Group:DLF has over 60 years of track record of sustained growth, customer satisfaction, and innovation. The company has 363 msf of planned projects with 52 msf of projects under construction. DLF primary business is development of residential, commercial and retail properties. The company has a unique business model with earnings arising from development and rentals. Its exposure across businesses, segments and geographies, mitigates any down-cycles in the market. DLF has also forayed into infrastructure, SEZ and hotel businesses. With over six decades of excellence, DLF is a name synonymous with global standards, new generation workspaces and lifestyles. It has the distinction of developing commercial projects and IT parks that are at par with the best in the world. DLF has become a preferred name with many IT & ITES majors and leading Indian and International corporate giants, including GE, IBM, Microsoft, Canon, Citibank, Vertex, Hewitt, Fidelity Investments, WNS, Bank of America, Cognizant, Infosys, CSC, Symantec and Sapient, among others. DLF pioneered the retail revolution in the country and brought about a paradigm shift in the industry by redefining shopping, recreation and leisure experiences with the launch of City Centre in Gurgaon in 2000. The Retail Malls business is a major thrust area for DLF. Currently, DLF is actively creating new shopping and entertainment spaces all over the country.

Lodha Codename Dawn Residential Apartments Ghodbunder Road

Lodha Codename Dawn is strategically located on Ghodbunder Road, Thane. This tranquil haven is nothing less than breathtaking, and provides the perfect setting for an integrated township blessed with every conceivable luxury – and even beyond the realm of your imagination. Conveniently located on Ghodbunder Road, Thane, which connect the Eastern and the Western Express Highways, this township is as close to the bustling city as it is to nature. In addition, this strategically located township boasts of easy access to both the central and Western Railway lines. Codename Dawn is an aesthetically designed township of 1, 2 and 3 BHK luxury residences built into the tallest buildings in Thane. 31 storied architectural gems threaded around a central lush green park of more than 3 acres, with breathtaking views all around, taking the concept of a perfect life to a new height. Majestic spacious apartments with world class fixtures, marble flooring and unparallel amenities await you. Be a part of the privileged few to enjoy panoramic views of breaking dawns and receding sunsets from your sundecks. It is as close to the bustling city as it is to nature. A 10 minute drive will get you to Majiwada Junction while a 20 minute drive is all it takes to reach Thane Station. The western hub of Dahisar is just a mere 20 minute drive.

Location:
Lodha Codename Dawn is located on Ghodbunder Road, Thane Mumbai.

Key Features of the Project:
Air Conditioned homes
Agglomerated Marble flooring in Living/Dining and Passage
High quality wooden flooring in all bedroom
Designed fitted Kitchen
Gas Detector in Kitchen
Separate Store in each apartment
German Grope CP fittings and American Kohler sanitary ware
Motion Sensors driver lighting in all toilets
All Toilets finished with high end vitrified tiles
Swipe Card enabled access to buildings
RFID controlled access to cars

Prices & Sizes:
1BR-1T sizes from 648 sq. ft to 864 sq ft.
2BR-2T sizes from 1044 sq ft to 1098sq ft.
3BR-3T size is 1485 sq ft.
Prices: 6291/-psf
Booking Amount: 54000/-

About Lodha Group:
The Lodha Group has several landmark developments to its credit, including World One - the world’s tallest residential tower; Lodha Bellissimo - the only Indian residential development to feature amongst the top 1000 landscapes in the world; and Palava - 21st century India’s largest planned city, spread over 3600 acres. The Group has also made history by recording the biggest land deal in India till date, buying a plot in Wadala for Rs.4,053 crore, from the Mumbai Metropolitan Region Development Authority (MMRDA). Pioneering new trends in the market, the Group introduced CASA by Lodha, offering the mid-income consumer luxury homes within easy reach. The Group also introduced the concept of branded office spaces, with offerings at every level, from world-class corporate offices to large scale office campuses to signature boutique offices for growing businesses.

Antriksh Zeal 12 Acres Residential Township at Gurgaon

Antriksh Group is an upcoming residential project Antriksh Zeal strategic located of Sector 112, in Gurgaon. Spread over 12 acres of sprawling land, the township is located at one of the most convenient, hottest and most sough place of Gurgaon. An Antriksh Zeal offer 2/3/4 BHK apartment where sizes are varying from 1500 to 2450 sq. ft. Antriksh Zeal is very close to world class malls multiplexes and is lies opposite to Relience SEZ. The complex offers you a perfect living location with being surrounded with elite posh colonies. Not to mention, the township is located adjoining with commercial sector 88 and is close to upcoming 5 star hotel on NH-8.

This new launch offer apartment that is well equipped with world class amenities and infrastructure to give buyers the excellence experience of living with high standard of living. It offers superb amenities for the residents. With the Indira Gandhi International Airport only 3 Kms, Existing Dwarka metro station in sector 22, 3.5 kms and South Delhi just 15 mins from the site, it provides excellent connectivity. With the Proposed metro line to pass right in front of the site it will add to its existing location advantage. With existing Schools, shopping centres and hospitals in Palam Vihar just 500 metres away, the project has all the amenities for high standard of life.

Location: Antriksh Zeal located at Sector 112 in Gurgaon strategic located 150 meter wide from Dwarka Expressway, Multiplexes all around and opposite to Relience SEZ.

Location Advantages:
Antriksh Zeal is located at a distance of zero KM from Delhi Border.
Antriksh Zeal is only 3 Kms. away from the Indira Gandhi International Airport.
Dwarka metro station sector 22, Dwarka is only 3.5 kms. from this project.
Proposed metro line to pass right in front of the site.
Just 15 mins. Drive from South Delhi.

Amenities:
Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Club House, Table Tennis and Kids Play Area, playground

Prices & Sizes:
2BR-2T-Study size is 1500 sq ft
3BR-3T-Study size is 2000 sq ft
4BR-4T-Study size is 2450 sq ft
Prices: Price on Request

About Antriksh Group:
An ISO 9001:2000 Certified, Profit making, highly rising, Real Estate company with a track record of quality construction. Leading builder and promoter of housing societies, commercial buildings, Shopping Malls etc. in Delhi, Noida, Gurgaon and all over India. Well equipped, plant and machinery and sound relations with India's leading Ready Mix Concrete (RMC) supplying companies like-Birla Ready Mix and J.K.Ready Mix. Company has lot of experience to work with reputed and well established Architects - Consulting Engineering Services India Ltd., G.C.Sharma & Sons, Andleys Associates (P) Ltd., Development Consultant, Vidyarthi & Associates, Design 'N' Design etc. and in ouse Architects. About DLF:

DLF has over 60 years of track record of sustained growth, customer satisfaction, and innovation. The company has 363 msf of planned projects with 52 msf of projects under construction. DLF primary business is development of residential, commercial and retail properties. The company has a unique business model with earnings arising from development and rentals. Its exposure across businesses, segments and geographies, mitigates any down-cycles in the market. DLF has also forayed into infrastructure, SEZ and hotel businesses. With over six decades of excellence, DLF is a name synonymous with global standards, new generation workspaces and lifestyles. It has the distinction of developing commercial projects and IT parks that are at par with the best in the world. DLF has become a preferred name with many IT & ITES majors and leading Indian and International corporate giants, including GE, IBM, Microsoft, Canon, Citibank, Vertex, Hewitt, Fidelity Investments, WNS, Bank of America, Cognizant, Infosys, CSC, Symantec and Sapient, among others. DLF pioneered the retail revolution in the country and brought about a paradigm shift in the industry by redefining shopping, recreation and leisure experiences with the launch of City Centre in Gurgaon in 2000. The Retail Malls business is a major thrust area for DLF. Currently, DLF is actively creating new shopping and entertainment spaces all over the country.

Fully loaded with imported floorings & kitchen, private lap pool, natural wooden floorings, air-conditioning, imported sanitaryware, & glass railings, these uber residences are meant only for the chosen few & the retail centre at Aranya -The Green City shall be a one stop destination for your weekend shopping and entertainment needs with a collection of all lifestyle brands and entertainment options under a single roof, being completely mindful of the fact that you would not like to travel far away from your residence for your shopping needs.

The major growth corridor of the area - the upcoming KMPExpressway, is located very close to the site. The Expressway is at an advanced stage of construction and shall soon be operational. The club - house comes studded with all the delights you desire, from the exotic spa, the soothing steam sauna, state of the art tennis and basketball courts, gymnasium, refreshing jacuzzi, as well as aerobics centre aimed at ensuring a healthy body and mind for you and your near and dear ones.

Also, with the easing of the ceiling on residential plots a few months ago in the NCR, the demand for such projects has witnessed a sharp increase.

This trend seems to be a reaction to the slowdown in the economy and the subsequent dampening of the real estate market that happened in the past few years. The situation forced builders and developers to think of different formats so as to attract all types of buyers.

Delhi has been seeing a wave of residential plots recently. Sapna Kulshrestha studies the shift in trend that is responsible for gradually changing the capital’s skyline.

Typically projects that come under the green purview are those that lay a strong emphasis on the use of environmentally friendly building materials, effective waste management and efficient energy systems. These are designed to substantially reduce or eliminate negative environmental impacts and improve existing unsustainable design, construction and operational practices.

Besides, the construction of plots rather than high-rise buildings was an attractive option for lower and middle-income buyers – as the cost of construction is less for such developments and the benefits can be transferred, making the purchase affordable for them.
